verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uri|strong="H0221"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*:

And I have \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* him with the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and in \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*, and in \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, and in all manner of \w workmanship|strong="H4399"\w*,
To \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* cunning \w works|strong="H4284"\w*, to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* in \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and in \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and in \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*,

And in \w cutting|strong="H2799"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, to \w set|strong="H4390"\w* \add them\add*, and in \w carving|strong="H2799"\w* of \w timber|strong="H6086"\w*, to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* in all manner of \w workmanship|strong="H4399"\w*.

And I, behold, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* with him \w Aholiab|strong="H0171"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahisamach|strong="H0294"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*: and in the \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* of all that are \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w hearted|strong="H3820"\w* I have \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, that they may \w make|strong="H6213"\w* all that I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee;

The \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, and the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* that \add is\add* thereupon, and all the \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*,\f + \fr 31.7 \ft furniture: Heb. vessels\f*

And the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* and his \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* with all his \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*,\f + \fr 31.8 \ft furniture: Heb. vessels\f*

And the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* with all his \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* and his \w foot|strong="H3653"\w*,\f + \fr 31.9 \ft furniture: Heb. vessels\f*

And the \w cloths|strong="H0899"\w* of \w service|strong="H8278"\w*, and the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, to minister in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*,

And the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* for the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place:\add* according to all that I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee shall they \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* thou also unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Verily|strong="H0389"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*: for it \add is\add* a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* between me and you throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*; that \add ye\add* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that doth \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* you.

Ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* therefore; for it \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto you: every one that \w defileth|strong="H2490"\w* it shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: for whosoever \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \add any\add* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein, that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* may \w work|strong="H4399"\w* be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*; but in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \add is\add* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of \w rest|strong="H7677"\w*, \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: whosoever \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \add any\add* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* in the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 31.15 \ft holy: Heb. holiness\f*

Wherefore the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, to \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* throughout their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*, \add for\add* a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

It \add is\add* a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* between me and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: for \add in\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he \w rested|strong="H7673"\w*, and was \w refreshed|strong="H5314"\w*.

¶ And he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, when he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w communing|strong="H1696"\w* with him upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \w written|strong="H3789"\w* with the \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
